review: The room that we stayed in was a corner room with tall windows and a window sill that was about 1 foot off of the floor. Of course our 2 year old son wanted nothing more than to climb on the window sills but| even though the windows appeared to be bolted and locked| it made my husband and I nervous (we were on the 11th floor). I sat on the window sill to keep our son from getting on the sill and noticed that a small window in the corner did not look like it was sealed. I attempted to open it and to my horror the window could be completely opened. Had my son discovered this| he could have easily opened it and fallen out. After getting myself back together I spoke with the front desk attendant| Star I believe| and she was quick in finding out whether the security guard on duty could lock the window.
